Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting details1. i was going to get coffee 2. my roommate 3. something flickering or on fire 4. it was like a flickering mass. it seemed to float to our street. it dimmed and then brightened. it began to dart from right to left. when directly over us, it appeared to climb in altitude and dimmed out. my roommate witnessed the object shoot off to the south. 5. elated, excited 6. it dimmed\blinked out. we don't know what the strange light on the side of the pic is or the haze that seems to surround the object. no flash was used.
Summary: Flickering amber mass that blinked and darted.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around December 29th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
